properties.name: --input-focus-bg
properties.description: Background color for the input when focused. Default: var(--color-foreground, 0 0% 0%) / var(--color-opacity-2, 0.3)

properties.name: --input-focus-border-color
properties.description: Border color for the input when focused. Default: var(--color-foreground, 0 0% 0%) / var(--color-opacity-3, 0.5)

properties.name: --input-border-color
properties.description: Border color for the input in its normal state. Default: var(--color-foreground, 0 0% 0%) / var(--color-opacity-2, 0.3)

properties.name: --input-border-radius
properties.description: Border radius of the input. Default: var(--border-radius, 2px)

properties.name: --input-padding
properties.description: Padding inside the input value element. Default: 4px 4px

pseudoClasses.name: :focus
pseudoClasses.description: Styles applied when the input value element has keyboard focus
